content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.1 Certification Presentation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Congratulations! We are more than happy to see you as a part of Technical Interview Certification team.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are dealing with the organization and managing the programs 'Certification for Technical Interviewers' & 'Certification for Technical Interview Mentors' and explaining EPAM Certification Program standards and specifics upon request, etc. The whole scope of responsibilities can be found \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/TI/Technical+Interview+Certification+Team\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Let us start with the presentation of our processes:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"size\":621768,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/98344872-af5f-4400-8961-776f87c770d9/Adaptation 2.2.pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/98344872-af5f-4400-8961-776f87c770d9/Adaptation 2.2.pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Adaptation 2.2.pdf\",\"name\":\"Adaptation 2.2.pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"98344872-af5f-4400-8961-776f87c770d9\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
